metadata.created: Tue May 07 2024 22:51:48 GMT+0200 (Ora legale dellâ€™Europa centrale)

colorscheme: objTheme => { for (i = 0; i < objTheme.szLabelA.length; i++) { if (objTheme.szLabelA[i].match(/investimento/i)) { objTheme.colorScheme[i] = "#ff0088"; } else if (objTheme.szLabelA[i].match(/tamponamento/i)) { objTheme.colorScheme[i] = "#0066cc"; } else if (objTheme.szLabelA[i].match(/scontro/i)) { objTheme.colorScheme[i] = "#ddbb22"; } else { objTheme.colorScheme[i] = "#00aaaa"; } } }
style.dbtableProcess: function(data, options) { data.addColumn({source:"DATA",destination:"year"},function(value){ return (value.split("/")[2]); }); data.addColumn({source:"DATA",destination:"month"},function(value){ return (value.split("/")[1]); }); data.addColumn({source:"DATA",destination:"day"},function(value){ var a = value.split("/"); var date = new Date(a[2],a[1],a[0]); return (date.getDay()); }); data.column("FERITI").map(value =>{ return (value||0); }); var illesiIndex = data.column("ILLESI").index; var feritiIndex = data.column("FERITI").index; var mortiIndex = data.column("MORTI").index; data.addColumn({destination:"pericolo"},function(row){ return ((row[illesiIndex]||0)*0.3+(row[feritiIndex]||0)*3+(row[mortiIndex]||0)*10); }); }
style.name: chart
style.title: Matera - incidenti 2023
